text:
On 12/28/2024 at 09:39 AM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 09:41 AM)
Subject:Re: AD is asleep
Is he still coming over today?
For that matter, if they are in a car wreck getting here, what is your and Natalie’s plan for us to communicate and figure that out? Is it just wait
till we both know they are missing AND you check OFW? Curious.
On 12/28/2024 at 09:01 AM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Subject:AD is asleep
Does he know he’s coming over?
Last Thursday he said he was not sure to me and Alan. I said it was “a regular day so count on it”. To which he replied “I know but Mom said
you won’t reply so we don’t know “  Let’s work on that. It’s not really fair to couch me that way.
Also not sure where he got the idea that MIT was like Phoenix university but that happened between his visits. He started proud and then was
kinda teasing me next time. Admission was super tough and the classes are really hard.
Maybe these things are beyond your control but bringing it up so you know I don’t think it’s good for him to look at me like some kind of
clown. I know you replaced me on July 4th, but he can’t so let’s make the best of it for him.
Message 280 of 287
Is there a reason I can’t see Adrian longer on Thursday since he is out of school? It seems like a particularly good time to take advantage of the
schedule. Please let me know what the issue is. Thanks.
Sent:12/28/2024 at 05:55 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 07:55 PM)
Subject:Thursday
Message 281 of 287
The schedule is for kids to be with me this entire winter break.
This Saturday and next Thursday are actually not part of the schedule.
Your continued angry and aggressive tone with me over these comms is scary.
I’m stepping away.
Sent:12/28/2024 at 08:00 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 08:00 PM)
Subject:Re: Thursday
